function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of research on the impact of VR and AR technologies on disease propagation in educational settings.","Impact":"Uninformed adoption of these technologies may lead to increased spread of contagious diseases in educational institutions.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research on the effects of VR and AR technologies on disease transmission in educational environments and establish best practices for safe usage.","Technologies":"Research studies, data analytics, environmental sensors, contact tracing apps, remote learning platforms.","People":"Students, teachers, school staff, educational administrators.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, educational institutions."},{"Description":"Lack of guidelines for safe implementation of VR and AR technologies in public places for security and patrol purposes.","Impact":"Inappropriate use of these technologies may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases in public areas.","Mitigation":"Develop and disseminate guidelines for the safe and responsible use of VR and AR technologies in public places, with a focus on disease transmission prevention.","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, IoT devices, wearable sensors, facial recognition systems, data encryption and privacy protection solutions.","People":"Law enforcement agencies, security personnel, public health authorities, technology developers.","Owner":"Public health organizations, law enforcement agencies, technology standards organizations."}]}
